result.arabic_text: إِذۡ تَبَرَّأَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتُّبِعُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُواْ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ وَتَقَطَّعَتۡ بِهِمُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَابُ
result.translation: 166. Kataaten mari (Abbootan luk Suge тага kinnuk) Akeeral gibdi digaala ubullu haa waqdi, ken kataate marak Bari yakkeeniih ken xakabak Suge Ramad dinuu kee ittah luk Sugen kacnih fantaaxaw yaggiriqeh.
